did you encounter further issues working with the workspace? (if not, I don't believe this should block declaring the I-build)
It appears to be non-blocking, at least from the JSF perspective although there was funny problem where my src folder lost it's java source folder status. Don't know if that was connected.

hmmm, I did not encounter that issue and don't *believe* it would be triggered by this NPE

unless there is a consistent repro (or we know that the issue with the src folder is related), I do not think this merits a respin; I do have a local fix and can commit that if a respin is needed for some other problem.
